Metadata.title: Focused Shares
Metadata.description: Discover a world combining focus and music, featuring lo-fi hip hop to rain sounds. Share your favorite YouTube videos in our diverse musical community.

Songs.title: Songs
Songs.description: Here you can find all the songs that are currently available on Focused Shares and you can sign up to add your own songs.
